author: felicity
msg: make M::SA::parse() not do the full recursive mime tree generation.  let M::SA::MsgContainer::find_parts() do it as necessary.  this makes check() run at about the same speed, but things like 'spamassassin -d' should run a little faster due to the reduced amount of work that needs to occur.

author: quinlan
msg: add min/max font size support using new font code
add remaining CSS3 colors to avoid missing invisible or low contrast text
encode HTML and CSS3 colors using hex (saves about 2k of memory)
merge tr/td handling into one routine
fix some minor bugs with new font code
